headline: Is It Worth Investing in Duke Energy (DUK) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Duke Energy (DUK) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?
